meanings.definition: The quality of being concise and succinct.
meanings.sent1: Her speech impressed everyone with its compendiousness.
meanings.sent2: The textbook's compendiousness made it easy to study for the exam.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's compendiousness in explaining complex topics was both helpful and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His notes were a beacon of compendiousness in the sea of information.
meanings.sent5: The compendiousness of the recipe made it a favorite among busy cooks.

meanings.definition: A brief and comprehensive summary or compilation.
meanings.sent1: The compendiousness of the report impressed the board members.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the compendiousness of the travel guide before her trip.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's hilarious compendiousness of the movie plot had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The compendiousness of the map helped them navigate through the maze-like city.
meanings.sent5: The compendiousness of the manual saved him hours of troubleshooting.
